author: Staff Reporter
text: The All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) has kick-started its election campaign in the town on Friday. Hundreds of cadres took out a rally to propagate achievements of the State government. The rally started at central bus stand and ended at Mariamman Temple. The cadres also undertook a door-to-door campaign by distributing pamphlets to the households. They distributed the State government’s ‘achievement booklets’ to people in and around the bus stand.
title: AIADMK rally
